name: Micro Focus Service Manager
description: This app supports a variety of object management actions on Micro Focus Service Manager (formerly HPE Service Manager)

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration

subarea.description: Subarea for the incident (e.g. Availability Issue)

no_implementation_effect.description: Effect of not implementing the change

implementation_start.description: Scheduled implementation start for the change

implementation_end.description: Scheduled implementation end for the change

department_owner.description: Owner of the department for the CI

project_key.description: Project Key to get the issue from
Key for project to update the object
